title: Motion Sickness Hell
review:
The exciting story of reaching another planet was a long drawn out boring affair.Horrific camera work left me feeling nauseous for a good hour afterwards.Armstrong came across as unfeeling and emotionally stunted. 
Aldrin seemed very watchable but was only given 3 or 4 minutes on screen.Apollo 13 it was not.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: So poor
review:
Cool actors couldn't save this one. 3 hours worth of tedium.
The dog was ok.
